name: Spanish Immersion
description: Join our Spanish Immersion course and dive into the rich and vibrant world of the Spanish language. Through a combination of interactive activities, engaging discussions, and practical exercises.

name: German for Beginners
description: Embark on a journey to learn German from scratch with our German for Beginners course. In a supportive and interactive environment, you'll acquire the fundamental skills needed to communicate effectively in German.

name: Mandarin Conversation
description: Take your Mandarin speaking skills to the next level with our Mandarin Conversation course. Designed for learners with prior knowledge of Mandarin.

name: Italian Language
description: Discover the beauty of the Italian language and culture through our Italian Language course. Whether you're a complete beginner or have some prior knowledge.

name: Japanese for Travelers
description: Planning a trip to Japan? Our Japanese for Travelers course is designed to equip you with essential Japanese language skills and cultural knowledge for your journey.

name: Arabic Calligraphy
description: Discover the ancient art of Arabic Calligraphy in our specialized course. Delve into the intricate strokes and fluid movements that make up this beautiful form of expression.
